headline: Seagate: Generative Audiovisual AI Could Create A HAMR HDD Boom
summary: Seagate (STX) leads HDD storage, powered by AI-driven demand and HAMR tech. Read here for and analysis of its growth potential and risks.

headline: Gold Just Hit $4,000. Mining Stocks Look Like the Best Way to Play It.
summary: Gold and other precious metals are glittering—and mining stocks are shining even brighter.  The  exchange-traded fund has climbed more than 130% in 2025, compared with a nearly 55% surge in the price of gold.  Newmont  a recent Barron’s stock pick, has jumped more than 135%.

raw.headline: Gold Just Hit $4,000. Mining Stocks Look Like the Best Way to Play It.

headline: Seagate Soars On HAMR Hopes, But Risk-Reward Has Flipped (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Seagate's Q4 2025 delivered strong EPS and margin beats, but guidance for Q1 FY2026 is muted. Read why STX stock is downgraded to Hold.
